code: import{createStore}from'redux';import reducer from'./reducer';var saveToLocalStorage=function saveToLocalStorage(state){try{return localStorage.setItem('state',JSON.stringify(state));}catch(e){return e;}};var loadFromLocalStorage=function loadFromLocalStorage(){try{var stateStr=localStorage.getItem('state');return stateStr?JSON.parse(stateStr):undefined;}catch(e){return undefined;}};var persistedStore=loadFromLocalStorage();var store=createStore(reducer,persistedStore);store.subscribe(function(){saveToLocalStorage(store.getState());});export default store;
